channel.title: Randomscape 525 Release (old pulsepk) by joshua & brent
channel.description:
Randomscape 525;
im releasing this because i quit Private Server's starting back on runescape, so no time to code, i hope you guys enjoy, This is based of Codeusa.
I CHANGED HOME TO SHILLO VILLAGE, ADDED CHAOTIC LONGSWORD & RAPIER DIDTN FIX CHAOTIC MAUL (not doing to)
Some info : CLIENT & SOURCE DOWNLOAD LINK : [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?cm96uewzcb77l6p]Click HERE[/url] client ip : Randomscapev1.no-ip.biz Port : 43594
To change ip ; [size=10pt]Thanks fridder to make this[/size] Okay since you guys have never run or seen a 508, first step. Open the source. Second step: Press on a folder named "Commands". Inside that folder there are 5 objects. Double click on the thing that says "Runserver". It is a windows batch file (.bat). Now you open the client and double click on the folder named "src". Now you open several files that will change the IP address so you can log in. First open "Class68_Sub20_Sub15". Search for (CTRL + F) no-ip. Now that you found it, it should look like this: something.no-ip.biz <-- Change that to 127.0.0.1 then save. Open up the file named "client" or "client.java". Search for the same thing, no-ip. When you found the IP, replace it with 127.0.0.1 and save it. Now open up the file named "Loader" or "Loader.java". Inside of there, do the same as above, search for no-ip and change it to 127.0.0.1 and save it. Now you compile it. If some error comes up like "The system cannot find the path specified.", right click on Build and press Edit. Then it should say [code]@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp ./bin/ ./src/*.java pause[/code] If you have a 64 bit operating system, that should be fine. If you have a 32 bit operating system, delete the (x86) so it would look like this: [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp ./bin/ ./src/*.java[/code] If you get an error, change the jdk1.6.0_21 to [b]your java version[/b]! If you don't know how to find that, there is a tool on www.java.com to find out what version you have.
You're welcome for the mini-guide.
Screen urls
[img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/8839/corpdk.png[/img] [img]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/4052/droppaty.png[/img] [img]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/3776/gwdy.png[/img] [img]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/9140/herbp.png[/img] [img]http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/6754/homeum.png[/img] [img]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/3406/kingblackdragon.png[/img] [img]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/8763/18659956.png[/img] [img]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/1420/naamloossk.png[/img] [img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/4203/pkzones.png[/img] [img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/4501/players.png[/img] [img]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/9158/questh.png[/img] [img]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/6931/specssg.png[/img]
how to give you're self owner rights (p):
find in the source 'commands.java'
[CODE] public boolean canChangeRights(Player p) { String users[] = {"El Goku"};[/CODE]
[COLOR="red"]AND this to[/COLOR]
[CODE] public boolean ownerRights(Player p) { String users[] = {"El Goku"};[/CODE]
Change el goku in you're name, Compile & restart enjoy :)
*Random Pvp drops *Multi zone *Rocktail,karambwa,sharks *super restores *overloads *Soulsplit *Herblore *Slayer
*Pk zones *Funpk (dont lose stuffs) *Over the bridge in shilo village (home) *Black dragons (multi) *Green dragons (1vs1)
*Npcs *Godwars 90% *Corp beast 95% *Kbd 100% *Barrows (minigame) *Tds 90%
*Special attack working 100% from *Dragonfire shield *Saradomin sword *All GODSWORDS *Abyssal whip *Dragon dagger *Zamorak spear *Vesta longsword *Statius warhammer *dragon claws *dark bow
*Npcrange 100% *Range vs player 100% *rune knifes *dragon darts *rune crossbow *magic shortbow *dark bow
*Npcmage 0% *Mage vs player 80% *99% ice barrage *99% ice blitz *100% Vengeance *95% miasmic spells *100% teleblock
[b]Credits to joshua (pulsepk) brent (El Goku)[/b]

item.title: Randomscape 525 Release (old pulsepk) by joshua & brent
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“RealVenomPVP, post:24, topic:364190”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=460420.msg3368633#msg3368633 date=1287019301]
@RealVenomPVP
Shouldn’t have quoted that, just use @ USERNAME

It is also possible to do that.
Go into the client files (Open the client folder and press on “src”)
Open up Applet_Sub1.java and search for

		Class108.aFrame1832.setTitle("RandomScape Client.");

Replace “RandomScape Client.” with your client name! So if I were to rename it to… HiScape, it would be

		Class108.aFrame1832.setTitle("HiScape Client");


[/quote]

Thank You So Much Although One More Question?

How Do You Change That Thing Where It Say’s
[UPDATES]
Server Restarts Every 180 Minutes

(When You First Login)

I Want To Change That But Dont Know How

Can You Help?[/quote]

You should learn how to do this sort of stuff on your own.
Search for “Server restarts every 180” and see what results come up. (This is for Vista and Windows 7 only, not XP)

Read full topic
